channel.title: Pages on CoZ:City of Zion
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on CoZ:City of Zion

item.title: CoZ #1 dApps Competition
item.description: City of Zion dApps competition DAPPS WINNERS The City of Zion hosted their first dApps competition to further elevate the NEO community through collaborative engagement. Below are the winners and honourable mentions that we really felt stood out. dAPPs Winners! displayed below by rank 10 winners 2 Honourable mentions 1st: NEO Smart IoT By: hal0x2328, phetter We saw two primary benefits to smart contracts when we first learned about them — the first is being able to accept micropayments with low or no fees, and second, being able to programmatically define when and how events should take place in the real world in a deterministic and verifiable way.

item.title: CoZ #1 dApps Competition
item.description: City of Zion is launching its first dAPPs Competition And we want you to get involved The City of Zion council is promoting a decentralised apps (dApps) competition to further elevate the NEO developer community. 13500 Total Gas Prize Up to 10 Winners receiving 1350 gas each Registration starts 16th of September 2017 Submission deadline 16th of November 2017 Competition details The City of Zion (COZ) Council is happy to promote the first NEO dApps competition.

item.title: CoZ #2 dApps Competition
item.description: City of Zion dApps competition DAPPS WINNERS The City of Zion hosted their second dApps competition to further elevate the NEO community through collaborative engagement. Below are the winners and honourable mentions that we really felt stood out. dAPPs Winners! displayed below by rank 10 winners 5 Honourable mentions 1st: Treatail By: gubanotorious Treatail enables online shoppers to make offers to any online store and negotiate a personalized deal.

item.title: CoZ #2 dApps Competition
item.description: City of Zion is launching its second dAPPs Competition And we want you to get involved The City of Zion council is promoting a decentralised apps (dApps) competition to further elevate the NEO developer community. 13500 Total Gas Prize Up to 10 Winners receiving 1350 gas each Submission starts 25th of January 2018 Submission deadline 25th of February 2018 Competition details The City of Zion (COZ) Council is happy to promote the second NEO dApps competition.

item.title: CoZ:City of Zion - Our Team
item.description: Our team City of Zion team of Council members, Advisors, Maintainers, Developers and Contributors Developer Woodehh Benjamin J.J. de Bos neo-php & CityOfZion.io developer Contributor MediaSmurf Thomas Lobker Contributor and community support Maintainer anthdm Anthony De Meulemeester Maintainer of neo-go Developer Brian Brian Lenz neo-python developer Developer slipo Silas Albrecht Developer Maintainer revett Charlie Revett Core CoZ Developer, NeoAuth Creator Developer zeshon Austin Hinderer Developer Security shargon Fernando Díaz Toledano Security Team Maintainer mhuggins Matt Huggins Neon Wallet Developer Maintainer gubanotorious Alex Guba C#/.

item.title: CoZ:City of Zion - Press information
item.description: Press City of Zion is an opensource community. However, our brand is precious to us. We like it! That's why we have a press area with a couple of HQ and Vector logo's for you to use. These logo's are free to use for promoting, advertorials, tutorials, banners and explanations. We do ask you to use the color schematics we have used below. This way we ensure our brand is used the way we thought of it!
